name: Kokomon
digivolveEffect: [Your Turn] (Once Per Turn) When an effect suspends one of your Digimon, <Draw 1> (Draw 1 card from your deck).

name: Tsunomon
digivolveEffect: [Your Turn] (Once Per Turn) When one of you other Digimon digivolves, gain 1 memory.

name: Agumon
effect: [Start of Your Main Phase] If you have a red or yellow Tamer in play, gain 1 memory.
digivolveEffect: [Your Turn] (Once Per Turn) When one of your red or yellow Tamers becomes suspended, <Draw 1> (Draw 1 card from your deck).

name: Guilmon
effect: [On Play] If the total trashes of both player's add up to 20 or more cards, this Digimon gains <Rush> (This Digimon can attack the turn it comes into play) for the turn.

name: GeoGreymon
specialDigivolve: Digivolve: 2 from Lv.3 w/[Agumon] in its name & w/[Dinosaur] trait>
effect: [Start of Your Main Phase] If you have a red or yellow Tamer in play, gain 1 memory.
digivolveEffect: [Your Turn] (Once Per Turn) When one of your red or yellow Tamers becomes suspended, <Draw 1> (Draw 1 card from your deck).

name: BlackGrowlmon
specialDigivolve: Digivolve: 2 from Lv.3 w/[Guilmon] in its name
effect: [When Digivolving] Both players trash the top 2 cards of their decks. Then, return 1 [Guilmon] or 1 card with [Growlmon] or [Gallantmon] in its name from your trash to your hand.
digivolveEffect: [On Deletion] Return 1 [Guilmon] or 1 card with [Growlmon] or [Gallantmon] in its name from your trash to your hand.

name: BlackWarGrowlmon
specialDigivolve: Digivolve: 3 from Lv.4 w/[Growlmon] in its name
effect: [When Digivolving] Both players trash the top 3 cards of their decks. Then, choose any number of your opponent's Digimon whose total DP adds up to 3000 or less and delete them. For every 10 total cards in both player's trashes, add 2000 to the maximum DP you can choose with DP-based deletion effects.

name: ChaosGallantmon
specialDigivolve: Digivolve: 3 from Lv.5 w/[WarGrowlmon] in its name
effect: (Trash) [End of Your Turn] By Deleting 1 of your Digimon with a digivolution card and [Gallantmon] in its name, you may play this card without paying its cost.[On Play] Delete 1 of your opponent's Digimon with 7000 DP or less. For every 10 total cards in both player's trashes, add 2000 to the maximum DP you can choose with DP-based deletion effects.

name: MedievalGallantmon
effect: [Security] At the end of the battle, play this card without paying its memory cost. If no Digimon was deleted by this effect, suspend 1 of your opponent's Digimon, and that Digimon doesn't unsuspend during their next unsuspend phase.

name: Matt Ishida & Tai Kamiya

name: Tainted Hero

Then place this card in your battle area.<Delay> (Trash this card in your battle area to activate the effect below. digivolveEffect: [Security] Place this card in its owner's battle area.
